burst.msg_body: Sequential read of variable length has been inferred
Could not widen since type i32 size is greater than or equal to the max_widen_bitwidth threshold of 0

Multiple burst reads of variable length and bit width 32 in loop 'VITIS_LOOP_31_1' has been inferred on bundle 'BUS0'. These burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation, based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
